bug_buster.desc_locked: See something you want to change on Kano – a pesky bug? Let us know by using the Help tool!

bug_buster.title: Bug Buster

feedbacker.desc_unlocked: You're a Kano creator, and a funky Feedbacker. You sent us your ideas, and that helps us make your computer even cooler.
feedbacker.title: Feedbacker

remote_roamer.desc_locked: Want to use a phone or tablet as your Kano display? Check out VNC in the Apps launcher...

remote_roamer.title: Remote Roamer

staying_super.title: Staying Super
